boho shaka waga kara aththe dewani loka sangraramaya ta pasuwayi. 1950 ganan walin pasuwa paribhogika illuma anuwa gowin wisin shaka kappadu kara sakas kirima aarambha karana ladi. 1960 - 1970 atharathura kalayedi naththal gas welandapola wadi diyunu wu namuth 1980 ganan wala aga bhagayedi swabhawika naththal gas sandaha welanda pola ha mila pahatha basina ladi. 21-wana shatha warshaya mul bhagaye di lokaya pura wikunana lada kruthima nowana swabhawika naththal gas atharin 98% kma shaka gowipal wala waga karana ladi.
